trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There was one other sighting in London on or around July 24th 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
Summary: Glowing/Pulsating object that quickly moved, then disappeared while in view.
divs: sighting detailsi was out for a drive with my wife when we noticed a bright orange\red light that was moving\pulsating. it was moving slowly, and it seemed to be getting brighter\dimmer as it moved, it seemed to speed up, change direction (instead of going parallel to us, it seemed to start moving away from us quickly, and then it just went out (light got dimmer as to just disappear). this happened all within 2 minutes. it did not look like an airplane (seemed bigger\brighter\had strange movements.)
